AT.name: Mario Sports Mix
AT.description: Wählen Sie Charaktere aus der Welt von Nintendo und Square Enix oder Ihren liebsten Mii-Charakter, um mit bis zu vier Spielern verrückte Versionen von Volleyball, Völkerball, Hockey und Basketball zu erleben. Mit der Wii-Fernbedienung lösen Sie Spezialfähigkeiten aus, während Sie sich Herausforderungen stellen, bei denen die ganze Familie sofort mitmachen kann. Lasst die Spiele beginnen!

AU.name: Mario Sports Mix
AU.description: Pick characters from the worlds of both Nintendo and Square Enix or your favourite Mii characters as up to four players enjoy zany versions of Volleyball, Dodgeball, Hockey and Basketball. Use the Wii Remote to pull off special moves as you tackle challenges the whole family will find intuitive to get to grips with. Let the games begin!

BG.name: Mario Sports Mix
BG.description: Pick characters from the worlds of both Nintendo and Square Enix or your favourite Mii characters as up to four players enjoy zany versions of Volleyball, Dodgeball, Hockey and Basketball. Use the Wii Remote to pull off special moves as you tackle challenges the whole family will find intuitive to get to grips with. Let the games begin!

BE.name: Mario Sports Mix
BE.description: Choisissez votre personnage préféré de Nintendo et Square Enix, ou votre Mii pour vous lancer, jusqu'à quatre joueurs, dans des parties délirantes de Volley-ball, Dodgeball, Hockey ou Basket-ball. Utilisez la télécommande Wii pour exécuter des coups spéciaux et préparez-vous à taper dans la balle ou sur les autres. Que le spectacle commence !

ES.name: Mario Sports Mix
ES.description: Escoge entre personajes pertenecientes a los mundos tanto de Nintendo como Square Enix, o bien a tus personajes Mii favoritos, para disfrutar con hasta otros tres jugadores de versiones estrafalarias del voleibol, balón prisionero, hockey y baloncesto. Ejecuta movimientos especiales con tu mando de Wii y afronta toda una serie de desafíos a los que toda la familia no tardará en coger el tranquillo. ¡Que comience el partido y la partida!

IT.name: Mario Sports Mix
IT.description: Scegli tra tanti personaggi di Nintendo e Square Enix o i tuoi Mii preferiti e competi in spassose versioni della pallavolo, del dodgeball, dell'hockey su ghiaccio e della pallacanestro per un massimo di quattro giocatori. Usa il telecomando Wii per eseguire mosse speciali mentre affronti sfide intuitive per tutta la tua famiglia. Sei pronto per scendere in campo?

Use the Wii Remote to pull off special moves as you tackle challenges the whole family will find intuitive to get to grips with. Let the games begin!

NL.name: Mario Sports Mix
NL.description: Kies een spelfiguur uit de wereld van Nintendo of Square Enix, of speel met je favoriete Mii-personage. Tot vier spelers kunnen het tegen elkaar opnemen in een knotsgekke wedstrijd volleybal, trefbal, ijshockey of basketbal. Voer speciale bewegingen uit met de Wii-afstandsbediening in competities voor de hele familie. Laat de spelen beginnen!

NZ.name: Mario Sports Mix
NZ.description: Pick characters from the worlds of both Nintendo and Square Enix or your favourite Mii characters as up to four players enjoy zany versions of Volleyball, Dodgeball, Hockey and Basketball. Use the Wii Remote to pull off special moves as you tackle challenges the whole family will find intuitive to get to grips with. Let the games begin!

PL.name: Mario Sports Mix
PL.description: Pick characters from the worlds of both Nintendo and Square Enix or your favourite Mii characters as up to four players enjoy zany versions of Volleyball, Dodgeball, Hockey and Basketball. Use the Wii Remote to pull off special moves as you tackle challenges the whole family will find intuitive to get to grips with. Let the games begin!

PT.name: Mario Sports Mix
PT.description: Escolhe personagens dos mundos da Nintendo e da Square Enix, ou as tuas personagens Mii preferidas, para que até quatro jogadores se divirtam com as invulgares versões de jogos de voleibol, dodgeball, hóquei e basquetebol. Serve-te do Comando Wii para levares a cabo jogadas especiais enquanto enfrentas desafios que toda a família vai dominar intuitivamente. Que comecem os jogos!

RU.name: Mario Sports Mix
RU.description: Выбирайте до четырех персонажей из миров Nintendo и Square Enix и наслаждайтесь забавными переделками волейбола, вышибал, хоккея и баскетбола. Используя Wii Remote для особых действий и для перехвата мяча, все члены семьи с легкостью освоят интуитивное управление, с которым уже знакомы игроки Wii Sports Resort. На старт, внимание, марш!

SE.name: Mario Sports Mix
SE.description: Pick characters from the worlds of both Nintendo and Square Enix or your favourite Mii characters as up to four players enjoy zany versions of Volleyball, Dodgeball, Hockey and Basketball. Use the Wii Remote to pull off special moves as you tackle challenges the whole family will find intuitive to get to grips with. Let the games begin!
